title: Tell me what my build lacks.
body:
https://i.imgur.com/0lk1wDC.jpg 

Soo tell me what's wrong with it again.
No matter what I build I lose anyway it seems , can't win any games anymore.

Please explain thanks

replies.body:
you lacked a good synergy effecting the right units

sure you had 5 small ones but 4 were effecting few units that could not abuse them that much

yordle buff is meh at 3 since it only effect those 3 and only one of them is a front liner so it kind of wasted

void buff is great and all but the 3 voids you had were 2 tanks and 1 assassin that only deal isolated damage so it get wasted on weak damages [cho ability would be an amazing nuke with the sorc buff and true damage void buff]

wild/brawlers are just mini buffs that dont add much either

sorc effect all which is good but you lacked good spells to go with the ap

 if you had one of these {{champion:31}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:25}} you would have a better chance at winning.
it looks like made with ultimate bravery.

Would of been better if you were able to switch out the Khasix for Cho, WW for Gnar and then it opens your trist up for a hyper carry. 

It's a decent mid game comp, so I'd probably be looking at the items and positioning in this game.

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=AA9wqTRQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-08-23T12:02:56.940+0000)
>
> It's a decent mid game comp, so I'd probably be looking at the items and positioning in this game.

Barely got any items, RNG threw all his lovely coins on me

Where did the money go?

Did you save it to econ? I'm guessing you spent it on levels, but didn't get a T4 unit?

I find the last part improbable, as you are level 8. So this is telling me more about how you don't know how to transition into late game and take advantage of your numbers.

You  can get Cho, ASol, Blitz, Gnar, Kennen. 

Once you have Asol and Blitz2, you can switch out the Ahri & WW (as blitz scales well with sorcerers). Now your trist can become a gnar or a kennen, which provides much better CC and damage than a single trist. 

Of course, still switch out the Khasix with Cho. 

If you just bulldozed through lvl7 and 8 without utilizing the rolls during those levels, that might be where the downfall is, as the decision to power level was probably not for the best.
